title: Remove legacy auto-prefix logic from IntersectTermsEnum
description: We forgot to remove some logic related with auto-prefix terms from IntersectTermsEnum.

comments.author: David Smiley
comments.content: Nice.  If you're in the mood, you might also want to strip out most references to "auto-prefix" in javadocs/comments as well.  For example BlockTreeTermsReader lines 62-69.

comments.author: Adrien Grand
comments.content: Good call, I'll remove them when pushing.

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
comments.content:
Commit 81eeae6db28dcc921d98b562fc75e6c5aa530799 in lucene-solr's branch refs/heads/master from Adrien Grand
[ https://git-wip-us.apache.org/repos/asf?p=lucene-solr.git;h=81eeae6 ]

LUCENE-8465: Remove more references to auto-prefix terms.
